name: Hiking Trails I - 14th Edition
description: Find trails that lead to pretty coves, quiet lakes and even a forested bog on the southern tip of Vancouver Island. Details 140 walks and hikes, with 34 maps. With lots of options for easy walks or more multi-day backpacking trips, this hiking guide will navigate you to island favourites. Covers the Capital Regional District, including Saltspring, Portland, and Sidney islands; the Saanich Peninsula; Sooke west to Port Renfrew; the West Coast Trail; and north to Spectacle and Oliphant lakes.
